channel.title: QuickScape Start Your Adventure Today ★ Staff Recruiting ★24/7 VPS hosted!
channel.description:
[FONT=Impact][SIZE=5]Quickscape[/SIZE][/FONT] is an advanced runescape private server. Quickscape is VPS hosted that means the server will be up and running for 24 hours a day and seven days a week. Start Your Adventure today , and join Quickscape Trust me It will be worth it !
[FONT=Impact][SIZE=5]Website[/SIZE][/FONT] [url=http://quickscape667.weebly.com/]QuickScape - Home[/url] [FONT=Impact][SIZE=5]Play Now[/SIZE][/FONT] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/87foqw63631ccm3/QuickScape.jar]QuickScape[/url]
Why choose us? Quickscape 667 has a 24/7 uptime with Staff already here to help you as soon as you log in. The players, voices' stand out. You won't be some anonymous person on this server but a player that decides what goes into the game to make your experience worth while.
[SIZE=4][FONT=Impact]This Server Includes[/FONT][/SIZE] Dicing PVM PVP Prestige Mastering Revenants Summoning Nex Nomad Donator Skilling/PVM AutoVoting (Tommrow Update) AutoDonation (Tommrows Update) Prestige Shops 90 % Skilling Donatorzone CUSTUMS
Standard Shops! [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2dl822r.png[/img][SPOIL][/SPOIL]
QuickScape Spirit Three Teleports !
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2qan3b4.png[/img]
